message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,000,000.  It's a great deal, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset to your business.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to offer $950,000. This is the maximum amount I can afford at this time. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I value our potential partnership, $950,000 is still below my minimum acceptable price.  I'm willing to come down to $975,000.  This reflects a significant compromise on my part, and I believe it's a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're able to accept this offer.

I understand your position, Alice. However, I must stick to my budget. I am willing to pay up to $960,000 for the product. This is the highest I can go without compromising other areas of my business. I hope this meets your requirements.
